title: 123Dave

comments.body: So you have BTC , but ask for fake collateral loan. Sound a bit strange     I smell scam...    https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5030169.msg61905969#msg61905969Quote from: Moto9999 on March 14, 2023, 05:06:40 PMI have btc

comments.author: Walk_Posner
comments.body: Maybe I can help you out f2f.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: 123Dave on January 06, 2023, 11:14:34 PMF2F in charlotte nc area your BTC 4 my USDThere are a lot of risks involved in sending PayPal (a reversible method) in exchange for Bitcoin (you cannot reverse the transaction), so it is best to avoid making any transaction except with a trusted member.Quote from: Maxre on March 28, 2023, 06:23:16 PMHi brother you can Buy Bitcoin easily on a Binance that is leading and one of the most secure platform because it offers zero Peer to peer trading fee and also it offers us security and other Support services and it is the future. Literally it made my life so much easy and also secure. I Always find it much more helpful to me. Why does this text look like it was generated by an AI bot?

comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on March 18, 2023, 01:33:16 PMScammers always recognize other scammers I'm only now reading your comment: it seems quite stupid of you to assume that I might be a scammer.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on March 18, 2023, 01:33:16 PMScammers always recognize other scammers So who is a scammer reorganizing a scammer?I think it would be much better if you included more information of how someone was scammed by HedgeFx... Don't you think?

comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on April 05, 2023, 11:53:30 PMSo who is a scammer reorganizing a scammer?I think it would be much better if you included more information of how someone was scammed by HedgeFx... Don't you think?Thank you logfiles, It’s since some weeks that I keep eyes on this forum user, and I have more than a doubt that him opened treads just for carry on some kind of scam: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5445759.msg62025942#msg62025942Easy to understand that no one with a bit of intelligence will give no collateral loans to newbie! Just seems An attempt to get other users' personal documents and proof of income

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on April 06, 2023, 12:18:51 AMEasy to understand that no one with a bit of intelligence will give no collateral loans to newbie! Just seems An attempt to get other users' personal documents and proof of incomeThat's assuming that dollarday isn't CYBER_COWBOY's alt account.  The other question is who's going to pay 21% interest for a week-long loan for one dinner's worth of grocery money?  There's definitely something phishy about CYBER_COWBOY's offer, and he has no leg to stand on calling out other members as scammers when there's no evidence of such.
